## API Functions

```{r}
movies <- GET("https://pokeapi.co/api/v2/pokemon")
```

```{r}
str(movies, max.level = 1)
movies$headers
# grab the list element we want and convert it to character and and convert to 
parsed <- fromJSON(rawToChar(movies$content))
# look at list - we want articles
str(parsed, max.level = 1)
str(parsed$abilities)
# variable names within articles
parsed$results %>% colnames()
# save as r object
applenews <- parsed$abilities
# print tibble of first 3 variables
as_tibble(applenews)
```
